SQL.LOAD: SELECT service_level_group_id, code, description, risk_type_id, cost_type_id, service_level_cost, effective_date, expiration_date, created_date, modified_date, created_by, modified_by, service_level_detail_id FROM elp_service_level_detail WHERE service_level_detail_id = :service_level_detail_id
SQL.LOAD_LIST: select sld.service_level_detail_id, sld.service_level_group_id, sld.code, sld.description, rt.risk_type_id, rt.description risk_type, sld.cost_type_id, getdescriptionfromlistitem(sld.cost_type_id,:language_id ) cost_type, coalesce(sld.service_level_cost,0) service_level_cost, sld.effective_date, sld.expiration_date from elp_service_level_detail sld join elp_service_level_group slg on sld.service_level_group_id = slg.service_level_group_id left outer join elp_risk_type rt on sld.risk_type_id = rt.risk_type_id --dynamic_where_clause
SQL.UPDATE: UPDATE elp_service_level_detail SET service_level_group_id = :service_level_group_id, code = :code, description = :description, risk_type_id = :risk_type_id, cost_type_id = :cost_type_id, service_level_cost = :service_level_cost, effective_date = :effective_date, expiration_date = :expiration_date, modified_by = :modified_by WHERE service_level_detail_id = :service_level_detail_id
SQL.INSERT: INSERT INTO elp_service_level_detail ( service_level_group_id, code, description, risk_type_id, cost_type_id, service_level_cost, effective_date, expiration_date, created_by, service_level_detail_id ) VALUES ( :service_level_group_id, :code, :description, :risk_type_id, :cost_type_id, :service_level_cost, :effective_date, :expiration_date, :created_by, :service_level_detail_id )
SQL.VALIDATE_SLD: select count(*) sld_count from elp_service_level_detail sld where sld.service_level_group_id = :service_level_group_id and sld.code = :code and sld.risk_type_id = :risk_type_id and sld.cost_type_id = :cost_type_id and :effective_date between sld.effective_date and sld.expiration_date
